entry.title: Vite report on Sun, 28 Jan 2024 08:03:44
entry.summary: In recent news, a psychologist has revealed two dangers of falling for an AI girlfriend. This highlights the potential risks and implications of forming emotional connections with artificial intelligence. Additionally, Amazon Prime Video has announced the addition of ads, starting from January 29 in the US, Canada, UK, and Germany. However, users will have the option to opt-out for a monthly fee of $2.99, potentially generating $1.3 billion in revenue. Earnings season is also in full force next week, with notable companies to watch including SOFI on Monday, AMD, GOOG, MSFT, and MTCH on Tuesday, and ALGN, MA, and others on Wednesday. Furthermore, Netflix has shocked the world with record Q4 net additions, gaining 13 million members and reaching a total of 260 million. This growth is accompanied by expanding margins and cash flow. Lastly, a new method of analysis is being used to study species in the deepest parts of the ocean, providing valuable insights into the biodiversity of these unexplored regions.
